introduction: 《澳洲达人》节目于2007年2月18日首播于澳大利亚Seven Network电视台。该节目的创意来自著名的《英国达人》节目。主持人Grant Denyer，裁判Dannii Minogue, Tom Burlinson和Red Symons。2010年播出第四季。(文：life_is_good@YDY)Australia's Got Talent is an Australian reality television show which premiered on February 18, 2007 on the Seven Network. The show was based on the Got Talent series format that originated with Britain's Got Talent. It was hosted by Grant Denyer, with Dannii Minogue, Tom Burlinson and Red Symons acting as judges.The first season aired at 6:30pm on Sunday nights. After a successful run, the series was given a vote of confidence as Seven moved the show to a more competitive Tuesday night timeslot. The second season aired from April 29, 2008. A third season, which aired on Wednesday nights, began on February 4, 2009.In January 2010 it was confirmed that the show will return in 2010 for a fourth series. Open auditions were held in February 2010.In February 2010 it was confirmed that former Australian Idol judge and radio personality Kyle Sandilands and former Westlife member Brian McFadden would be joining the judging panel alongside Dannii Minogue for the show's fourth season.
